body: @Codevine Idk if you've read my summary for this one already, but in case you formed your opinion on this work without having read it, here it is: https://pastebin.com/u/DrinksandDame/1/0amUAFWA   . Anyway, I don't expect a long ass summary to magically change your opinion, but hey might as well give it a read to at least know exactly what you don't like about it. Up to you.
just trash lmao WTF is this shit

''but i'll fuck others. but i still like u tho.''  that's kind of classic shit. they're guilty as fuck. but still continue to fk and let all the memories go to hell just bcz of a DICK you getting on temporary beach vacation. and that's basically the plot all about. probably. i mean i can't read shit. but i didn't need to.
